comments:
I'm doing New->Visual Class->Swing (JInternalFrame). I fill in the class name and click on Finish. Nothing happens. I press cancel and see a new class that has only this in it:

========================================================
package sven.gui.eq;

import javax.swing.JInternalFrame;

public class Test extends JInternalFrame {

}
=========================================================

The error log shows:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.wizards.NewVisualClassCreationWizard.getGeneratorInstance(NewVisualClassCreationWizard.java:98)
at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.wizards.NewVisualClassCreationWizard.applyContributor(NewVisualClassCreationWizard.java:297)
at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.wizards.NewVisualClassCreationWizard.finishPage(NewVisualClassCreationWizard.java:346)
at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.wizards.NewVisualClassCreationWizard$2.run(NewVisualClassCreationWizard.java:462)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.BatchOperation.executeOperation(BatchOperation.java:39)
at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaModelOperation.run(JavaModelOperation.java:720)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1714)
at org.eclipse.jdt.core.JavaCore.run(JavaCore.java:3949)
at org.eclipse.jdt.core.JavaCore.run(JavaCore.java:3906)
at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.wizards.NewVisualClassCreationWizard$3.run(NewVisualClassCreationWizard.java:473)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

Looks like the source template used for the code generation of the class ContentPaneSourceContributor is missing from the JFC plugin. Must have been deleted during some refactoring we did back last month. JApplet has the same problem and uses the same contributor as JInternalFrame. Thanks for finding this. 

I should be able to fix this by the next integration build due out this week.
*** Bug 125977 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 125979 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 125978 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Re-created JContentPaneSourceTemplate.javajet and redirected JFrameSourceTemplate.javajet to generate JFrameSourceGenerator.java.

Fixed and released to HEAD stream for 1.2M2
